move_details.name: spectral-thief
move_details.effect_description: Steals the target’s stat increases, then inflicts regular damage.  Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user’s stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target.  Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.
move_details.flavor_text: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.
